college.name: SP Jain Institute of Management and Research (SPJIMR) Mumbai
college.latest_update: SPJIMR Mumbai is one of the top B-School in India. SPJIMR PGDM program was ranked by Financial Times MiM Rankings 2024 as No 1 MBA-equivalent program in India, ahead of MBA programs of Top 3 IIMs. SPJIMR Mumbai PGDM Placements are also at par with top IIMs with average salary 2024 of Rs. 33.00 Lakhs per annum. SPJIMR PGDM Admission 2025 are open and last date to apply is November 22, 2024. Apply Now.
college.course_description: SPJIMR offers a broad spectrum of programmes and courses for postgraduates, executives, entrepreneurs, women, and doctoral programs. SPJIMR offers 2 years full-time PGDM; PGDM (BM); Global Management Programme; 1 Year full-time PGPM; Post Graduate Executive Management Programme (PGEMP); Post Graduate Programme in General Management (PGPGM); Post Graduate Programme in Marketing and Business Management (PGPMBM); Doctoral Fellow Programme in Management (FPM) among others.

course_table.Eligibility: Bachelor's Degree, with at least 50% marks or equivalent CGPA
Bachelor's Degree, with at least 50% marks or equivalent CGPA

college.name: NMIMS School of Business Management
college.latest_update: NMIMS is consistently ranked among the top business schools in India. The MBA program at NMIMS has achieved remarkable placement statistics with an average salary of Rs. 25.00 Lakhs per annum in 2024. The admission process for 2025 batch is currently open and candidates can apply through NMAT by GMAC.
college.course_description: NMIMS offers diverse MBA programs with various specializations including Core MBA, HR, Finance, and Marketing. The curriculum is industry-focused and updated regularly to meet current business needs. The school also offers doctoral programs and executive education courses.
